questions.question: Considering the overall textual layout, what is the predominant orientation of the ingredient list?
What is the primary color used for the text detailing the other ingredients?

Observing the typography, what kind of typeface is predominantly used for the ingredient descriptions?

From a visual assessment, what is the relative size of the text describing 'OTHER INGREDIENTS' compared to the individual components?
What is the apparent visual separation method employed between the 'OTHER INGREDIENTS' label and the ingredient list itself?

Does the textual information exhibit any variations in font weight (boldness) within the overall ingredient list?

Is there a noticeable contrast between the text color and the background color of the image?
